Interface IOfficerApplicationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
OfficerApplicationService
public interface IOfficerApplicationService
Interface for managing officer applications including creation, status update, and retrieval by project or user.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addApplication(String projectName, String userID)
    Adds a new officer application for a given project and user.
    void
    applyForOfficer(HDBOfficer officer, BTOProject project)
    Submits an officer application for the given officer and project.
    OfficerApplication
    chooseFromApplicationList(Scanner sc, List<OfficerApplication> applications)
    Allows selection of an officer application from a list.
    List<OfficerApplication>
    getApplicationsByUser(String nric)
    Retrieves all officer applications submitted by a specific user.
    List<OfficerApplication>
    getProjectApplications(String projectName)
    Retrieves all officer applications for a specific project.
    void

    Updates the status of an officer application.

  • Method Details

    • addApplication

      void addApplication(String projectName, String userID)
      Adds a new officer application for a given project and user.
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project
      userID - NRIC of the user

    • updateApplicationStatus

      void updateApplicationStatus(OfficerApplication application, OfficerAppStat newStatus)
      Updates the status of an officer application.
      Parameters:
      application - The officer application
      newStatus - The new status to assign

    • getProjectApplications

      List<OfficerApplication> getProjectApplications(String projectName)
      Retrieves all officer applications for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The project name
      Returns:
      list of officer applications

    • chooseFromApplicationList

      OfficerApplication chooseFromApplicationList(Scanner sc, List<OfficerApplication> applications)
      Allows selection of an officer application from a list.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      applications - List of officer applications
      Returns:
      selected application

    • getApplicationsByUser

      List<OfficerApplication> getApplicationsByUser(String nric)
      Retrieves all officer applications submitted by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      nric - NRIC of the officer
      Returns:
      list of officer applications

    • applyForOfficer

      void applyForOfficer(HDBOfficer officer, BTOProject project)
      Submits an officer application for the given officer and project.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer applying
      project - The project to apply to
